title: #1467 Feelings vs. Mechanics
itunes:title: #1467 Feelings vs. Mechanics
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing Drew's bout with diverticulitis and Adam's lack of ability to empathize with people who are in pain or struggling with something.  The conversation then turns to Afghanistan and how the American pull out of armed forces was handled. They also touch on the efficacy of masks and how that information has played into covid messaging. They also turn to the phones and speak with a caller who is looking for thoughts on where we are as a nation approaching the 20th anniversary of the 9/11 tragedy. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
TommyJohn.com/ADS
The Jordan Harbinger Show
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
Pluto TV
